knimeNode.name: PFAM Accessor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides an interface to Sanger Institute PFAM RESTful webservice.

fullDescription.intro:
Provides an interface to Sanger Institute PFAM RESTful webservice.
NOTE: the node is deliberately slow (which is not user-configurable) to ensure that Sanger's websites are not overloaded, and that a KNIME user is not banned.
NOTE: This node does not provide all the functionality of the website, but it does provide enough, if carefully used, to be able to fetch the data. It is strongly recommended that you test with just a few rows and verify results with the website itself before processing large datasets.

ports.inPort: Input data which contains the column with identifiers to use
ports.outPort: Input columns with additional entry information provided via PFAM
